description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b. Physical description: 23 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on machine-made paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Occasional staining. Origin: Jumādá I 1271 H [January-February 1855] (leaf 102b). Incipit: کتاب الغصب والکلام في موضوعه واحکامه ولواحقه
author: Rashtī, Ḥabīb Allāh ibn Muḥammad ʻAlī, 1818 or 1819-1894
extent: 102 leaves : paper ; 279 x 192 (172 x 92) mm bound to 286 x 196 mm
title: Kitāb al-Ghaṣb.
creator: رشتي، حبيب الله بن محمد علي، 1818 or 1819-1894
subject: Forcible entry and detainer (Islamic law)
binding note: Full red leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants and blind-tooled fillets.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
